title: Bilateral Army Exercise Series between Pakistan, Malaysian Armed Forces concludes
content:
RAWALPINDI, Oct 24 (APP): The Bilateral Army Exercise Series held between Pakistan and Malaysian Armed Forces has concluded that commenced on October 9 and culminated on October 22 in Malaysia.
The exercise was based on 2 stages, namely Cross Training Exercise and Field Training Exercise, an Inter Services Public Relations (ISPR) news release here on Tuesday said.
The exercise has greatly benefited both the Malaysian and Pakistan Army to strengthen bilateral relations and establish friendly relations amongst officers and members of both the countries by exchanging ideas, knowledge and skills.
